title: Dk-behrt: Teaching language models international classification of disease (icd) codes using known disease descriptions

abstract: The widespread digitization of healthcare and patient data has created new opportunities to explore machine learning techniques for improving patient care. The sheer scale of this data has particularly motivated the use of deep learning methods …

title: Social determinants of health extraction from clinical notes across institutions using large language models
details: VK Keloth, S Selek, Q Chen, C Gilman, S Fu, Y Dang… - npj Digital Medicine, 2025
abstract: Detailed social determinants of health (SDoH) is often buried within clinical text in EHRs. Most current NLP efforts for SDoH have limitations, investigating limited factors, deriving data from a single institution, using specific patient cohorts/note …
